name: Melonverse Quilt
description:
Dedicated to Sgt_Slaughtermelon, the metaverse explorer, worldbuilder, crafter of composite shapes and colors working harmoniously. He has inspired many, and is considered a good friend and teacher to a vast number of us as well.

Thank you for everything you've done.
With Love, Your Convergence Online Family 

Art by - Dawnia Darkstone (Letsglitchit), Silverdusk, TheGlitchedArts, jrdsctt, KateTheCursed, VoidNick, CyberShakti, Snebtor, EtherealZephyr, TheOkina, RobekWorld, FiveTimesNo
